description: JavaScript Load Image is a library to load images provided as File or Blob objects or via URL. It returns an optionally scaled and/or cropped HTML img or canvas element. It also provides methods to parse image meta data to extract IPTC and Exif tags as we

name: blueimp-load-image

scripts.build: cd js && uglifyjs load-image.js load-image-scale.js load-image-meta.js load-image-fetch.js load-image-orientation.js load-image-exif.js load-image-exif-map.js load-image-iptc.js load-image-iptc-map.js -c -m -o load-image.all.min.js --source-map url=load-image.all.min.js.map
scripts.postversion: git push --tags origin master master:gh-pages && npm publish
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run unit
scripts.version: npm run build && git add -A js

title: JavaScript Load Image
